abstract: Verizon Communications’ top executive dismissed speculation his company would merge with wireless venture partner Vodafone Group, saying such a deal would offer little benefit, Reuters reported.
snippet: Verizon Communications’ top executive dismissed speculation his company would merge with wireless venture partner Vodafone Group, saying such a deal would offer little benefit, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: The top executive of Verizon Communications‘ dismissed speculation his company would merge with wireless venture partner Vodafone Group, saying such a deal would offer little benefit, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Verizon Chief Sees No Appeal in Vodafone Merger
